biotools.summary: CeLaVi (Cell Lineage Visualisation tool) is a web-based visualisation tool that allows to use data derived from multiple technologies to interrogate the cell lineage whilst visualising the spatial context, the identity and the properties of the cells.

bioschemas.name: CeLaVi
